anya-e0105n25:1: Kena pakārena katoti ettha anantarapañhe vuttappakāreneva kato. Tathā hi ācariyo saṁyuttanikāyato
anya-e0105n25:2: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
anya-e0105n25:3: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti saṁ. ni. 1.23 –
anya-e0105n25:4_0: Imaṁ gāthaṁ paṭhamaṁ dassetvā tattha padhānavasena vuttā sīlasamādhipaññāyo visuṁ
anya-e0105n25:4_1: visuṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā akāsi. Evaṁ kurumāno ca pañcahipi nikāyehi sīlasamādhipaññāpaṭisaṁyuttāni
anya-e0105n25:4_2: suttapadāni uddharitvā tesaṁ atthañca sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāhi bhāsāparivattanavasena dassetvā
anya-e0105n25:4_3: tāsu vuttāni sīhaḷikavatthūni ca vinicchaye ca pakāsesi. Visesato pana tasmiṁ kāle
anya-e0105n25:4_4: pākaṭā sakasamayaviruddhā samayantarā ca bahūsu ṭhānesu dassetvā sahetukaṁ paṭikkhittā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n25:5_0: Tattha hi cariyāvaṇṇanāyaṁ “tatra purimā tāva tisso cariyā pubbāciṇṇanidānā dhātudosanidānā
anya-e0105n25:5_1: cāti ekacce vadanti. Pubbe kira iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulo rāgacarito hoti, saggā
anya-e0105n25:5_2: vā cavitvā idhūpapanno. Pubbe chedanavadhabandhanaverakammabahulo dosacarito hoti,
anya-e0105n25:5_3: nirayanāgayonīhi vā cavitvā idhūpapanno. Pubbe majjapānabahulo sutaparipucchāvihīno
anya-e0105n25:5_4: ca mohacarito hoti, tiracchānayoniyā vā cavitvā idhūpapannoti evaṁ pubbāciṇṇanidānāti
anya-e0105n25:5_5: vadanti. Dvinnaṁ pana dhātūnaṁ ussannattā puggalo mohacarito hoti pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0105n25:5_6: ca āpodhātuyā ca. Itarāsaṁ dvinnaṁ ussannattā dosacarito. Sabbāsaṁ samattā pana rāgacaritoti.
anya-e0105n25:5_7: Dosesu ca semhādhiko rāgacarito hoti. Vātādhiko mohacarito. Semhādhiko vā mohacarito.
anya-e0105n25:5_8: Vātādhiko rāgacaritoti evaṁ dhātudosanidānāti vadantī”ti ekaccevādaṁ dassetvā so
anya-e0105n25:5_9: “tattha yasmā pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulāpi saggā cavitvā idhūpapannāpi ca
anya-e0105n25:5_10: na sabbe rāgacaritāneva honti, na itare vā dosamohacaritā. Evaṁ dhātūnañca yathāvutteneva
anya-e0105n25:5_11: nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthi. Dosaniyame ca rāgamohadvayameva vuttaṁ, tampi ca
anya-e0105n25:5_12: pubbāparaviruddhameva. Tasmā sabbametaṁ aparicchinnavacana”nti visuddhi. 1.44 paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0105n25:5_13: Taṁ paramatthamañjūsāya nāma visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāyaṁ “ekacceti upatissattheraṁ sandhāyāha,
anya-e0105n25:5_14: tena hi vimuttimagge tathā vutta”ntiādinā vaṇṇitaṁ visuddhi. ṭī. 1.44.
